Html:
My Word document has multiple Heading 1 sections. I need have each Heading 1 section in the separate HTML file. What would be the best way to accomplish that?
Thanks a lot for the help.

Dragan 

P.S. What can I do with images? Is there a plan to support images?

Hi,

 We currently donot support Page Headers in the conversion, since there is no pagination built into HTML as such. A workaround could be to use frames, iFrames or DIVs to display the headings, and render the rest of the document in the content frame.

----------------------------------------------------------
Header Frame/DIV                                                                
----------------------------------------------------------
Content Frame (Document converted to HTML)                                                               




----------------------------------------------------------

Do provide us a more detailed scenario. We will be very happy to help you with your scenario.

Best regards,
Anand
